website_summaries.verdict: The most affordable Naruto figure on the market features more articulation than you’d ever hope for, making it easy to pull off some sweet ninja moves.
pros: Extremely articulated figure with 22 moving joints
Includes 2 pairs of hands, ninja weapons, and wide black stand

customer_reviews.title: Head doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it 5 starts but unfortunately the head doesn’t stay on. In my 10 year old son’s words “I love my New Naruto action figure but the thing it’s good for is being in the box because that’s the only way the head doesn’t fall off”
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever for a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: So my son has really gotten into the no toys phase at 9 years old. And I wasn't sure what to get him for his birthday. But this gift was a hit... And eventhough I had to wait until after November 9 for it to get here. He was uber excited about it. I can officially say I am the coolest mom on the planet..
customer_reviews.author: monica moses

customer_reviews.title: Not bad of a toy, but head keeps falling off
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy, but the head fell off immediately after opening and keeps falling down. My son still likes it, but constantly have to put the head back on
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Colorful but head came off with first turn
customer_reviews.text: Item was just what grandson wanted but for the money it should have lasted longer than 5 minutes before the head popped off my grandson is careful with his action figures but literally Just after taking it out of the packaging he was looking at it and went to rotate his headend it popped off it goes back on but doesn’t stay long... again great colors and appearance at first glance just not durable
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Awesome action figure can't wait to give it to my sister
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: The head keeps popping off.
customer_reviews.text: It's a birthday gift to my son. he opens up the toy with excitement and the head keeps popping off I'm going to try and crazy glue it on. He's so upset. Literally the minute he takes it out the box the head fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Loving mom

customer_reviews.title: UZAMAKI
customer_reviews.text: This figure is hella dope! The paint looks good, the hailing’s are great. I’m 23 and I love naruto! The one short fall of this figure is his head. It does pop off when you get too physical with the figure. But you can pop it on and right back into place. This figure is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jakerson

customer_reviews.title: Not one of the best figures
customer_reviews.text: The joints on the figure did not bend well for my little boy!
customer_reviews.author: Kakashi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Head broke off before he could even play with it
customer_reviews.author: somaya

customer_reviews.title: good 4 its price
customer_reviews.text: not playable or durable but good value for its price and gr8 for display
customer_reviews.author: Naif A. Hereb

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas for my 10 yr old son. He loves them. Good moveable action figure. Not a fan of removing hand parts.
customer_reviews.author: Bella G

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I was a collector and wouldn’t have opened the package, but it is a gift for my son. He loves it but says it’s hard to make poses, or very good movable parts.
customer_reviews.author: alejandro soto

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Received it in timely manner, head broke off 3rd day.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Keep your eyes out for the head!
customer_reviews.text: Stands well in various posing. Only sad thing is his head pops off pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: MgfRosati

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After paying $50 for the toy. As soon as my nephew opens the toy, Naruto's head comes completely off. We put it back on and it came right back off. This definitely was not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. It was painted very well. My only problem is that it is a little difficult to put the kunai knifes on. But worth it. I put it in my Manga shelf
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Broken head
customer_reviews.text: My dad bought me this toy I like to play with it but the head keeps falling off not put together well
customer_reviews.author: Fsan

customer_reviews.title: Very breakable
customer_reviews.text: This item broke the first time my granddaughter played with it. Had to return it. Not happy, she was upset.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hurtibise

customer_reviews.title: Naruto action figure
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this action figure for Christmas. I was a little pricey but very hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The toy arrived with 2 left feet.
customer_reviews.text: My son received McFarlane today. It has 2 LEFT FEET. I would return it but my son waited so long to receive it and he does not want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad seller
customer_reviews.text: My son opened on Christmas and head wont stay on ball in neck joint is too small
customer_reviews.author: William W. Harris III

customer_reviews.title: Naruto
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes it a lot. Got it for him for Xmas. And a Naruto Fan as well too
customer_reviews.author: cyanglady

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: It’s exactly what my son wanted and I’m so impressed with the quick delivery! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

product_meta.title: McFarlane Toys Naruto Action Figure, Multi
product_meta.description: In becoming jinchūriki (the vessel) of the nine-tails, many survivors of the attack on the village hidden in the leaves blamed Naruto uzukami, causing him to be shunned and ostracized by his home. Vowing to become Hokage (the village leader) and regain the respect of his peers, Naruto embarks on countless adventures, and encounters many hardships along the way. Throughout the journey, his abilities as a Ninja begin to strengthen, allowing Naruto to become a true hero, not just to his village, but to the entire world.
feature_bullets: Highly detailed sculpt of Naruto based off the anime Naruto: Shippuden
Ultra articulated, fully customizable figure with 22 Moving parts for full range of motion
Figure comes with two sets of hands, fists and gripping and two kunai knives
7-Inch scale figure features accurate and hyper-realistic paint decorations
7-Inch scale figure features accurate and hyper-realistic paint decorations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
